long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is built specifically for the SuperCell mobile game Clash of Clans.  

This tool is great to use while watching videos and streams as well as checking base images to see if the base has been 3 starred.  It will take a screenshot of your browser window and send that image to BurntBase to be scanned.  You will then be directed to the BurntBase website with the results from that scan.

Watch your favorite streamers and find out if the bases they are covering have been 3 starred!
